title: Sending Problem
content: When sending an email using Thunderbird application it does not send and always require to have a password. I am using verizon.net email and used an app password to send an email. The app password is somehow not save or stick on the Thunderbird server settings. Did multiple app password already before I was able to send it. Are you having an outage or an update with regards to the Thunderbird application?
creator: aeons2005
